Episodes.Title: Over the Moon
Episodes.Actors: Matt Berry, Robert Bathurst, Doon Mackichan
Episodes.Plot: A tipsy Steven appears on the "Lorraine" chat show and tells a story from his past that could bring down the U.S. government. Later, he suffers stage fright ahead of his starring role in Macbeth.

Episodes.Title: Beauty Calls
Episodes.Actors: Matt Berry, Robert Bathurst, Doon Mackichan
Episodes.Plot: With Ed dating former beauty queen Penvelope, Steven hooks up with her friend Clancy Moped. However, their romances are jeopardized when the guys are invited to judge a beauty contest.

Episodes.Title: Bob a Job
Episodes.Actors: Matt Berry, Robert Bathurst, Doon Mackichan
Episodes.Plot: Jane persuades Steven to take part in a Royal Variety Performance hosted by Bob Monkhouse. Meanwhile, Danny Bear prepares for an operation.
